title: Must buy!
review:
100% honest review, used it fully for about 10 days now.
First of all the build quality of the phone is awesome, feels premium.
Screen is good though not completely bezel less but yes its impressive both on and off. The FHD+ resolution is really good,crisp,sharp and vibrant. Super smooth touch. Aspect ratio 18:9 provides good viewing experience especially videos and apps that supports it.
Next, UI is pretty good, I personally feel that it is better than MIUI.
Sound quality of main speaker and the earpiece is very good, loud and crisp. It also has loud voice mode for calls for better sound.
Fingerprint sensor is good. Provides additional functions like pulling down the notification bar and scroll through photos. Clicking pictures is a standard feature now a days.
Now come to the Camera which is one of the USP of the phone. The front camera is 'ACTUALLY' better than the rear camera. For the "BOKEH" effect you may have to struggle a bit while using the rear cam but it is quiet easy in the front cam. Some people are putting negative reviews because they can not take bokeh effect shots. Let me make it simple for you, in the camera interface, the top bar has options in which second one is the portrait mode. Turn that on.Then in the bottom right you have two options vertically aligned.
The first one in the option to turn bokeh effect on or off(second one is the beauty level with a icon of a female face). Remember bokeh effect only works in the portrait mode. The procedure is same for both front and rear cam.
Facebook apps sometimes hangs the phone. (They do it in all phones,this is not an exception).
Battery could have better, but it easily holds for a day on normal usage and may last even longer with minimal usage. Two power saving options are present. Ultra power saving may provide some more hours in standby mode which is actually good when you are travelling without power backup.
Personally speaking the 11K variant is best buy. 15K for 1GB extra ram and 32GB extra storage is not justified.
Last but not the least, you will be satisfied by this phone. It is good.
HOPE THIS REVIEW HELPS. THANKS ALL

title: Terrific purchase
review:
Hello

Before purchasing this product I have used MI A1 and Redmi Note 4 . I will try to compare these 3 phones as per my experience.

I used redmi note 4 for almost 9 to 10 Months. Overall experience was really good the only problem which I faced is the weight and even the front camera. Later on my birthday my wife gifted me the MI A1 .... Again the same issue the weight and the size of the device was more , But it clicks really good pictures from back camera. I felt MI A1 a very boring device because of its UI which was stock android. I really enjoined using MI devices because of its MIUI. Because of this reason I sold MI A1 and Purchased this lite weight beauty.

Advantages of purchasing 9 Lite:-

1. Perfect phone for 1 handed usage and lite weight.
2. EMUI loaded with lot of customization and Functionalities
3. Front facing camera clicks really good selfies at this price range
4. Display , Build and Design of the Phone is top notch.
5. Network reception and call quality is perfect
6. Medium level games like WCC2. Sachin Saga, Asphalt Nitro can be played without any lags.
7. Fingerprint scanner unlocks the phone in fraction of a second.
8. Last but not the least Back cover provided with in the box fits perfectly and does not make phone in hand feel bulky.
  
Disadvantages:-

1. Back camera is average if compared with MI A1.
2. Sometimes we can see a minor lag hope it will be fixed in upcoming OTA update.
3. High end gamer has to rethink before purchasing !
4. EMUI comes with some uninstallable bloat-wares 

I hope my review might help to decide whether to go for this device or not!

title: excellent phone in 9900, cant be beaten at this price
review:
This is 4th Honor phone in my family in last 1 yr...so good job Huawei to step up as a serious player in  India.

now abt the Honor 9 lite..Great Phone.. best deal in 9900 Rs paid after  citi bank discount.....

1. Cameras: Simply awesome. nice colour balance some like saturated some dont ..but its better than honor 7x
2. Size: Amazing....not exactly a single handed usable phone but very compact and superlight. I have honor 7x but thats  big and geavy
3. OS: Typical honor style custom skin, and oreo features are visible here and there..u can t make out its oreo until u long press icons and they show menu. I would say, they should have provided  the geberic pixel launmcher as well for an oreo experience.
4. Special feature: Face unlock hopefully to be available soon for this phone so big thumbs up.
5. Battery: Very nicely optimized, lasts u 1 full day, I rxed phone battery was 67% that was 12 noon, By end of day it was 15% at 8 pm and by then I had the phone installed with 3+GB whatsapp data and 1GB apps downloaded. I started using battery saver then and battery was 3% at 10pm..sobig thumbs up.i got 4 hr Screen on time from 67% battery.
6.Speed. : For unknown reasons it perform equallly good to my 4gb Honor 7x.with 30% low price.

Only down side it feels too fragile, its solid in build but it keeps me worried the glass back, so good looking back cover is must

it came with no screen guard Back cover provided is a down for me...but its no biggie..the phone is awesome and ousines the price

review: Stunning design

title: Review post 1 week usage
review:
OK now...Here is going to be what I call, a genuine and Honest review. I've read many reviews on this phone with people saying..." Amazing Camera", "Great Battery backup" and ...what not stuff. 

After using the phone for a week now...I feel:

1. Quad cameras is a TOTAL MESS. Rear camera is so damn horrible ...that I have no words to explain. Front camera is somewhat better.
2. Battery backup is reasonable as long as you don't end up playing huge games ( heating is also normal, not bad at all).
3. 18:9 display is so majestic...that...I felt...I've paid this money ONLY for that display. So brilliant is its display.
4.  Glass back gives you a premium feel ( Fingerprint magnet as well...this phone unless..you starting using a good back cover or the one supplied by Huawei ).
5. No lag AT ALL on most of the applications I have used ( mind you: I am not playing DEAD TRIGGER or ASPHALT 8 which revealed frame drops).

With these observations...I want to say, for 10,999...you are getting a smartphone with decent performance. Rear Camera is HORRENDOUS....but with this kind of display and optimum performance...I guess...I am happy to live with it !!

Thanks for reading and...Good luck with these "Flash" Sales.

title: Very Good
review:
Honest review after 12 hours of usage from a previous MiA1 user.

Display-8/10 

 fhd plus looks really bright and colorful but one thing i found a bit disappointing was lag in full screen mode in some apps and fonts are not sharp in chrome.

Camera-8.5/10 
Mia1 wins above this only in portrait mode.rest this beast is a clear winner.Better color reproductivity ,Amazing front camera and smooth camera interface are its USP

Battery7/10
-Charging isn't that slow..2 hours for a full charge but battery is draining a bit gaster than Mia1.

Phone sound-7.5/10
Though louder than mia1 but sound isn't that clear.A bit difficult to comprehend what a speaker is saying while wathing movies but thats manageable if you lower the volume to half

Processing-8.5/10
No lag whatsover other than during full.screen mode in some apps.

Looks-9.5/10
18:9 aspect ratio and 2.5d glass back looks really classy but the phone looks very similar to honor 8 lite


Final verdict
Both Mia1 and honor lite are very good product
If you want a sleek looking,responsive phone without love for portrait mode,go for honor lite.
But if you want a stock android experience.with a better rear camer go for mia1.

title: Best phone you can get in this price segment.
review:
What do you need in a phone costing at 11k?

1.Body - Supeb body finish with 2.5D glass curve coated on a 
                metal. Premium look.
2.Screen -  What should I tell about it. It's just mesmerising.
                    18:9 display with minimum  bezel
3. Camera - Good in light condition. Super fast shutter speed
                      Great composer, balanced exposure with great 
                      colour  balance. Front Camera is just out of this
                       World at this range. 
4. Finger Print Sensor -  Fast and Accurate everytime.
5. Battery-  5-6 continuous heavy usage. 1 day complete 
                     average usage. 1.5 days low usage.Backup is good.
6. Performance - Previously I was using Mi Note 4 and when i 
                               switch to it I felt no difference. Performance

Overall this is the best phone you can have at this price range.

 They are paid to highlight Mi phones etc

title: Following Cons of phone and flipkart
review:
1. No video call available from Native dialer. Jio VOLTE Video call not possible. "Huawei suggested to use third party app like Skype, duo etc" [problem with all Huawei phones ] 

2. No VOLTE on Airtel, only 4g available but Airtel has launched VOLTE in my city. 

3. Double tap to lock/wake screen is not working. DidFactory reset but same result. (check if all have the same problem)

4. Slow charging, it took me more than 3 hours to charge from 20 to 100%, while phone was on standby.



Pros, all you know

Go for it if you can live with above mentioned problems faced so far
Edit 1
Phone stopped working and now Flipkart 2 times denied my return request by giving lame excuses, now waiting from last 5 days for return window to open,  didn't expected that from Flipkart, delivery fast , but when you get into trouble, no solution

title: Good in overall quality
review:
After 1 week of use i hve found that, the mob is good in overall quality.. As the smartphone is value for money so dont expect very high camera quality from it... M not a heavy user bt as i used it from last 8 days  so iam here to give my review so it can help you if u wann buy it...so we will start from its camera as it is highlighted by brand. 
Overall rating- 9/10
Value for money... 

1.camera-8/10
Rear camera - 7/10
As the camera is good in light bt sometimes u will find that the edges are not clear cut as in mi a1 or in other smartphone from that budget.. 
Low light quality of camera is not so good bt yeah detailing is good in low light, as camera have the spe cial features for the low light it will improve the quality of pictures bt you have to wait it for some time, 
The best feature of camera is light painting, if you have a skill nd if you are photography lover then this will be really helpful to you...
The depth mode nd the bokhe effects are good.. Bt in portrait mode you will find that somewhere edge's are missed up.. 
The quality of video recordings is good bt as it doesn't have an optical image stabilisation the video unstable.. Bt overall quality of recording nd voice is good. 
Front camera-9/10
I think this is the one of the best camera in 16k budget smartphones... You have a options like depth mode nd filters too, the overall quality is very good, detailing are also good, nd in low light screen flash option is there.. Portrait mode is better than rear.. 
The depth mode is good enough.. Bt in low light quality becomes low than the normal.. 

2 Battery - 7/10
As it has 3000mah battery obviously you will find that it will drain fast as compared to other devices... The overall batteries life is average bt thanks to the company as there is inbuilt power saving modes are there which can improve battery life much better...if u wann then u can add 1 star for the power saving modes which really works good nd help you to save power upto good extent. 

3.  performance 9/10
After 8 days of use... I hav find that therr is no lag when you're playing heavy games on high settings... The graphics is very good, nd games play smoothly...
I have used asphalt xtreme, modern combact 5, shadow fight, gods of rome nd many other heavy games the overall graphics nd performance is  best in this price range...as it has a powerful kirin processor it makes the heavy tasks easier... Nd one of the  best thing is it already comes with the android oreo 8.0, which makes your phone smooth nd fast... 
So overall quality of the performance increases 

4.scree.-9/10
Though the screen is quite large enough u can easily handle it with your 1 hand, 
The brightness is very good, 18:9 aspect ratio of screen is very good,
Bt some were you will find that the colours are warms than normal bt its fine.. 
Overall its better than other..
The display is full hd+ nd the quality of pictures is really jst an awsm..bezeless display increases the beauty of smartphone.. Once you hond it in your hand, you feel that its really a good thing... 

5.Look-9/10
The look of the mobile is really awsm you will enjoy it bt while enjoying make sure that it will not fall down..
As the back is also made from the glass so u have to take care of that.. I have deducted 1 star bcoz i didn't find that the building quality very high, bcoz as it has glass on both of its side, there must be gorilla glass at least 1 of the side bt u didn't find it...
So take care while handing nd use back cover which is provided by company... 
Which is a goo6 thing...

6. Charging-7/10
As it doesn't have a fast charging mode so u cant charge your mobile fast..... It will almost take 2hrs30mins for full charging from 0 to 100% which is not so good... 
So the charging is slow..
So this is the overall review guys if you have some queries then reply.. I hope it will be useful to you...

title: Review this product
review:
Beauty & The BEAST

First impression is simple outstanding. It docent looks like a 11k Smartphone.  Look & feel is pretty impressive. I like the color Sapphire Blue.
Inside the Box :
1. Smartphone
2. Hard Transparent Back Case with a mat texture
3. User Manual
4. Warranty Card
5. Data Cable
6. Charger (5V-2Amp)
7. Sim Ejector Pin

Pros:
Awesome Design with premium look
Fast and snapy performance
Super Fast Finger print Scanner
Pretty Good Camera (Specially in day light conditions) - Not yet tested in night time
Android Oreo & EMUI 8
18:9 Display Looks Impressive

Cons :
No fast Charging takes a bit longer time to charge.
Hybrid Sim Slot (Sim+Sim or Sim+SD Card)
Speaker Sound is Loud but not clear

Note : Its just an initial impression. Their are lot more to check.

Verdict : I this this is only of the best pick at the price is 10999 3GB & 32GB Variant. 4GB & 64GB is overpriced.
